name: Lilongwe Presbytery
description: The Lilongwe Presbytery covers the Lilongwe region and oversees several churches and pastors. It focuses on community engagement and spiritual growth.

name: Kasungu Presbytery
description: The Kasungu Presbytery is responsible for the Kasungu region. It supports the spiritual and administrative needs of its churches and members.

name: Dedza Presbytery
description: The Dedza Presbytery serves the Dedza region. It focuses on pastoral care and community development initiatives.
